Card

A card is a rectangular container that holds your content, makes it easy to digest, and sparates it from other similar content.

This is content

The Basics: Group and Block

The most basic elements in the Foundation for Apps grid are the Group and Block.

Basic HTML

Wrapping your content with the card class creates the basic structure. Your text will be contained in a card-section class to give it the proper padding. You can create Tabs with this basic HTML:

```html

The most basic elements in the Foundation for Apps grid are the Group and Block.

```

The most basic elements in the Foundation for Apps grid are the Group and Block.

Advanced HTML

Add an image and card-divider class and you have one fancy looking Card. You can create advanced versions of Card with this HTML:
```html
This is a header

Look at This Swag Card

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Quasi iusto reprehenderit voluptatem odio deleniti provident aliquam qui magnam aspernatur necessitatibus.

```
This is a header

Look at This Swag Card

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Quasi iusto reprehenderit voluptatem odio deleniti provident aliquam qui magnam aspernatur necessitatibus.

Additional Options

You can easily customize Card with these color classes:

```html .dark = dark color .primary = primary color .success = success color .warning = warning color .alert = alert color ```

Sass Variables

You can customize with [Item] with these variables in _settings.scss:

```scss $card-background: #fff; $card-color: isitlight($card-background); $card-border: 1px solid smartscale($card-background, 7%); $card-radius: $global-radius; $card-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(#000, 0.2); $card-padding: $global-padding; $card-margin: 0.5rem; $card-divider-background: smartscale($card-background, 7%); ```
